attributes.action: A knighthood for "Johnnie" Johnson of Dam Buster fame.
attributes.background: He is the last surviving member of 617 Squadron RAF, who took part in the raids on the Ruhr damns during WW2. He is so very deserving of this honour.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
